subject: Reorganize layout: swap columns, reverse overlay, add auto-scroll
body:
- Swap visualization and input columns so visualization appears first (left on desktop)
- Remove initial black overlay - visualization now starts fully visible
- Reverse overlay behavior - analyzed data now covers the image instead of revealing it
- Add auto-scroll to top when visualization updates for better UX
- Rename CSS class from 'transparent' to 'covered' to reflect new behavior
